biography.title: Biography
biography.first_st: born in usme, south of bogota/colombia
biography.first_p: Since 2019 we have been in constant search of our own sound, we work to nurture the idea of music as an emotional journey. That's why we look for sounds that make us feel more
biography.third_st: King Kong Five Live' is a musical experience,
biography.second_p: a journey that has been characterized by mixing Latin percussion rhythms such as cumbia, merengue and salsa, taking them to genres such as ska and reggae.
biography.third_p: The group has been summoned to different stages; sharing the stage with artists and bands of the district and national scene as:
biography.four_p: You will be able to enjoy a mixture of different musical influences that have marked our birth.
biography.four_st: 'King Kong Five is currently working on their first ep.'

footer.text_two: This website is owned and operated by

backline.audio_salap: Professional System with the following features:
backline.audio_sala_li_uno: 2 way minimum stereo 110 db average FOH, no major drop.
backline.audio_sala_li_dos: Professional Systems, suggested brands: DAS, JBL, ElectroVoice.
backline.text_consola: 8 GROUP, 4 PARAMETRIC BANDS AND AT LEAST 8 AUXILIARY PRE/POST AND INSET POINT ON ALL CHANNELS AND SUBGROUPS.
backline.bass_text: LANEY AMPLIFIER SYSTEM 4 X 10 WITH 1 X 15 BI AMPLIFIED 500W MINIMUM.
backline.proyeccion: VISUAL PROJECTION OF THE GROUP'S OFFICIAL IMAGES
backline.mezcla_cuatro: MIX 3 & 4 (2-WAY SYSTEM OR MINIMUM FULLRANGE WITH SUB)
backline.registro_text: THE EVENT ORGANIZERS ALSO AUTHORIZE THE BAND TO TAKE PHOTOGRAPHS AND AUDIO AND/OR VIDEO RECORDINGS BEFORE, DURING AND AFTER THE PERFORMANCE ON THE STAGE AND IN THE PRESS AREA, OR FOR ANY OTHER USE THAT THE BAND DEEMS APPROPRIATE.
